name: GitHub Blog
description_zh: GitHub 官方博客，涵盖产品更新、开发者故事与工程实践。
description_en: Official GitHub blog covering product updates, developer stories, and engineering practices.

name: Hacker News
description_zh: 全球极客与创业者的每日必读，聚合高质量的计算机科学与创投资讯。
description_en: Essential daily reading for geeks and founders, aggregating high-quality CS and startup news.

name: 阮一峰的网络日志
description_zh: 中国知名技术博主，内容涵盖编程入门、科技趋势与个人随想，通俗易懂。
description_en: A famous Chinese tech blog covering programming tutorials, tech trends, and personal thoughts.

name: V2EX
description_zh: 一个由程序员、设计师与创意工作者组成的活跃社区。
description_en: An active community for programmers, designers, and creative workers.

name: Solidot
description_zh: 面向奇客的资讯平台，专注于硬核科技、开源软件与数字隐私。
description_en: News for geeks, focusing on hard-core tech, open source software, and digital privacy.

name: CoolShell (酷壳)
description_zh: 陈皓（左耳朵耗子）的技术博客，专注于底层技术、系统架构与深度观点。
description_en: A technical blog by Chen Hao focusing on underlying technologies, system architecture, and deep insights.

name: Paul Graham Essays
description_zh: 硅谷创业教父 Paul Graham 的随笔，涉及创业智慧、编程哲学与社会思考。
description_en: Essays by Silicon Valley venture capitalist Paul Graham on startups, programming, and philosophy.

name: Pixiv
description_zh: 全球知名的插画、漫画与小说创作交流平台。
description_en: A leading global community for creators to share illustrations, manga, and novels.

name: Smashing Magazine
description_zh: 面向专业网页设计师与开发者的在线杂志，提供高质量的前端与设计教程。
description_en: An online magazine for professional web designers and developers, offering high-quality tutorials.

name: 少数派 sspai
description_zh: 致力于分享高效工作方法、优质软件应用与高品质数字生活指南。
description_en: Dedicated to sharing efficient workflows, quality apps, and digital lifestyle guides.

name: 小众软件 (Appinn)
description_zh: 专注于推荐免费、小巧、实用且有趣的软件工具。
description_en: Focuses on recommending free, compact, practical, and interesting software utilities.

name: The Verge
description_zh: 主流科技媒体，探索科技、科学、艺术与流行文化的交融。
description_en: Mainstream tech media covering the intersection of technology, science, art, and culture.

name: Ars Technica
description_zh: 深度科技报道，服务于IT专业人士，内容详实且具备批判性。
description_en: Deep tech journalism serving IT professionals, known for detailed and critical content.

name: 机核网 GCORES
description_zh: 不止是游戏资讯，更深入探讨游戏相关的文化、历史与生活方式。
description_en: More than just game news; exploring the culture, history, and lifestyle surrounding video games.

name: Polygon
description_zh: Vox 旗下的游戏媒体，侧重于游戏背后的故事、人物与文化评论。
description_en: Vox Media's gaming publication, focusing on the stories, people, and culture behind games.

name: Indie Hackers
description_zh: 独立开发者社区，分享创始人如何构建盈利的副业项目与SaaS产品。
description_en: A community where founders share stories of building profitable side projects and SaaS products.

name: Daring Fireball
description_zh: John Gruber 的博客，以对 Apple 产品的深度解析与犀利评论著称。
description_en: John Gruber's blog, famous for its deep analysis and sharp commentary on Apple products.

name: 36Kr
description_zh: 中国领先的新经济媒体，第一时间报道互联网创投、科技动态与商业趋势。
description_en: China's leading new economy media, reporting on tech startups, trends, and business news.

name: 不如读书
description_zh: 专注于阅读感悟与深度思考的个人 Newsletter，探讨科技、商业与人文的交汇。
description_en: A personal newsletter focusing on reading notes and deep thinking at the intersection of tech, business, and humanities.

name: Karpathy
description_zh: AI 大神 Andrej Karpathy 的个人博客，分享关于深度学习与大模型的深刻见解。
description_en: Personal blog of Andrej Karpathy, sharing deep insights on AI, Deep Learning, and LLMs.

name: 高效磨耳朵
description_zh: 喜马拉雅上的英语听力训练频道，提供丰富的英语原声素材，适合利用碎片时间磨练语感。
description_en: An English listening practice channel on Ximalaya, providing rich native audio materials.

name: AI洞察日报
description_zh: 每日更新的人工智能行业动态、前沿论文与技术趋势摘要，帮助快速跟进 AI 浪潮。
description_en: Daily updates summarizing AI industry dynamics, cutting-edge papers, and tech trends.

name: Airing's Blog
description_zh: 一位全栈开发者的个人博客，记录编程技术、开源项目维护与生活随笔。
description_en: A full-stack developer's blog recording coding techniques, open-source projects, and life essays.

name: Last Week in AI
description_zh: 权威的 AI 周报，汇总每周全球人工智能领域的新闻、研究论文与伦理讨论。
description_en: Authoritative weekly AI digest summarizing global news, research papers, and ethical discussions.

name: Best Blogs
description_zh: 精选聚合平台，通过算法与人工筛选全球最优质的软件开发与技术博文。
description_en: A curated aggregator selecting the best software engineering and tech blog posts globally.

name: TED Talk Daily
description_zh: TED 官方每日播客，每天分享一个启发思考的演讲，涵盖科技、社会与心理学等领域。
description_en: Official TED daily podcast, sharing one thought-provoking talk every day covering tech, society, and psychology.

name: The Daily
description_zh: 《纽约时报》出品的王牌新闻播客，每天深入解读一个全球热点新闻故事。
description_en: The flagship news podcast from The New York Times, providing in-depth analysis of a top news story every day.
